question: “Sugamya Bharat App” is being launched as a part of which ministry?
option2: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
option4: Ministry of Women and Child Development
answer: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Social justice and Empowerment has developed an app named “Sugamya Bharat App”. It has been developed by the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities (DEPwD), for enhancing accessibility.
It is being launched along with a hand book named “Access – The Photo Digest”.
